AI Description: Perftools Lite (PTL) provides a framework for lightweight performance analysis of parallel applications. It allows users to collect and analyze performance data to identify bottlenecks and optimize code performance. PTL focuses on event-based performance analysis to monitor and measure the execution behavior of parallel applications.
Core Features:
1. Event-based performance analysis
2. Lightweight and efficient performance data collection
3. Identification of performance bottlenecks
4. Optimization of code performance
5. Monitoring and measuring parallel application execution behavior
